alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Eastern Essex; Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Eastern King William; Eastern King and Queen; New Kent; Richmond; Western Essex; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond); Western King William; Western King and Queen; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern King and Queen, northwestern Richmond, New Kent, Caroline, west central Westmoreland, northern Henrico, central Hanover, King William and Essex Counties and the City of Richmond through 615 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms over Dawn, or 8 miles northeast of Ashland, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dawn around 515 PM EDT. Ashland and Kings Dominion around 530 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Beazley, Gum Tree, Etna Mills, Cohoke, Rose Garden, Biscoe, Chamberlayne, Atlee, Ashcake and Crouch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
